data.name: Quetzal
data.detailed_description:
JOIN THE COMMUNITY


About the Game



Quetzal is a Latin American inspired fast-paced precision platformer highly focused on reactive gameplay. You’ll discover a mystical underground world, defeat blood ravenous stone creatures, and survive tortuous obstacles in your quest for answers and meaning.



Embark on a mystic and profound journey as Quetzo, one of the last remnants of the Midbirds. Quetzo’s journey will be a rich, yet painful experience that will not only help restore the balance of nature, but make them come to terms with their heritage and place in the world. Turn adversity into advantage by understanding the potential and beneficial nature of obstacles and enemies behaviours.

Features


  • Explore a tainted underground land from aeons ago.
  • Master your skills and abilities to defeat ravenous stone creatures.
  • Tight and responsive controls. Easy to learn but hard to master.
  • Find creative and unconventional solutions to overcome obstacles.
  • Fast-paced gameplay focused on reactive elements.
  • A wide variety of enemies with different attack patterns and behaviours.
  • Bond with forest creatures to uncover the world’s ancient history.
  • Minimal pixel art style.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1953670/Quetzal/

data.short_description: Embark on a mystic journey in Quetzal, a fast-paced precision platformer where you use obstacles to your advantage. You’ll discover a mystical underground world, defeat blood ravenous stone creatures, and survive tortuous obstacles in your quest for answers and meaning.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or Similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 Series or Similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.6 GHz or Similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 Series or Similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
